TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SKPathAddMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Controls how a path is added to another path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPathAddMode Append = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Source path contours are added as new contours.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPathAddMode Extend = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The path is added by extending the last contour of the destination path with the first contour of the source path. If the last contour of the destination path is closed, then it will not be extended. Instead, the start of source path will be extended by a straight line to the end point of the destination path.
